item.title: Burnout
item.author: contact.us@alistapart.com (Scott Boms)
item.description: Does every day feel like a bad day? Blurry boundaries between work and home, and the “always on” demands of the web can lead to depression and burnout. Learn the signs of burnout and how to maintain your bliss.
item.dc:subject: Culture, State of the Web

item.title: Creating Intrinsic Ratios for Video
item.author: contact.us@alistapart.com (Thierry Koblentz)
item.description: Have you ever wanted to resize a video on the fly, scaling it as you would an image? Using intrinsic ratios for video and some padding property magic, you can. Thierry Koblentz shows us how.
item.dc:subject: Code, CSS, HTML and XHTML, Scripting

item.author: contact.us@alistapart.com (Daniel Ritzenthaler)
item.dc:subject: Design, Graphic Design, Layout, User Interface Design, Process, Creativity
